view_msg.name: view_msg
view_msg.title: Show Msg Circle
view_msg.comment: Shows a circle with a message on it

msg_hover.name: msg_hover
msg_hover.title: Show Msg Circle on hover
msg_hover.comment: This only works if Show Circle is enabled.

msg.name: msg
msg.title: Message
msg.comment: This is the messasge that appears in the circle.

usermsg.name: usermsg
usermsg.title: UserMessage
usermsg.comment: This is the messasge that appears in the circle.

view_more.name: view_more
view_more.title: View Highlighted Msg
view_more.comment: This shows a message in red color in the circle. This requires Show circle to be enabled.

view_more_text.name: view_more_text
view_more_text.title: View More Text
view_more_text.comment: This is the text that is shown if you enable View Highlighted Msg

view_overlayer.name: view_overlayer
view_overlayer.title: View Color Overlayer
view_overlayer.comment: Show a transparent over lay of color. If YES then it will show an overlay with a color that you have selected in Overlay Color

overlayer_color.name: overlayer_color
overlayer_color.title: Overlayer Color
overlayer_color.comment: Choose a color for the overlayer color. This option needs View Overlayer to be enabled.

is_link.name: is_link
is_link.title: Is Clickable
is_link.comment: This option makes the project card clickable/not clickable

show_reflection.name: show_reflection
show_reflection.title: show reflection
show_reflection.comment: This option enables reflection on hover of the project card.

view_don_bar.name: view_don_bar
view_don_bar.title: View Donation bar
view_don_bar.comment: This option enables/disables the donation status bar
